q: Yesterday, in responding to a question about Chrysler's government loans, I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern," Sergio Marchionne 's statement said. I regret the remark, which I consider inappropriate. Sergio Marchionne said Chrysler remains grateful for the bailouts and noted that no other parties were willing to assist in Chrysler's recovery. I think this is simply a steppingstone for him to go to Washington. He would love to be Treasury secretary, former GOP presidential candidate Steve Forbes told FOX Business. While Treasury may be a tough sell given that finance isn't Eric Schmidt 's forte, a different Cabinet secretary post could be in the cards.

On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city "rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city."
